column1: Quiz on Graph Theory and Relations

column1: A relation is a function if?
column2: Each element of the domain maps to exactly one element of the codomain
column3: Each element of the domain maps to at least one element of the codomain
column5: Each element maps to multiple elements

column1: What is the adjacency matrix of a graph?
column5: A square matrix of vertex degrees

column2: A connected graph where all vertices have even degree

column1: What is the minimum spanning tree of a graph?
column2: A subset of edges connecting all vertices with minimum total weight
